1591180.name: Death Walk
1591180.description:
In a post-apocalyptic world overrun by extraterrestrials, embody the legendary hero Shadow Strike in an exciting action sandbox game with leveling up and beat 'em up mechanics. Dive into a retro universe reminiscent of 90s games and explore areas infested with hostile minions who will stop at nothing to stand in your way.

From survival , to intense boss battles and epic arena duels, Shadow Strike offers a varied and immersive gaming experience where every action counts. Chain battles, and level up to unlock Shadow Strike's 4 legendary powers.

With stunning retro graphics and an immersive soundtrack, dive into the post-apocalyptic universe of Shadow Strike and tackle the most challenging obstacles. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and become the hero who saves humanity from the grip of extraterrestrial invaders?
